scheme_name: Stipend Scheme for Poultry Farming Training for Schedule Caste (Gujarat)
description: This scheme provides a stipend to Scheduled Caste individuals undergoing poultry farming training to enhance their skills and promote self-employment in poultry farming.
key_features: Stipend of Rs. 4,000 per month during training
Training to equip individuals with poultry farming skills

category_criteria: Applicant must belong to Scheduled Caste
eligibility.additional_criteria: Must be a resident of Gujarat

steps: Contact the local Animal Husbandry Department or training institute
Enroll in approved poultry training program
Submit application for stipend with required documents

special_notes: Stipend provided only during training period
